planet.name: WASP-173 A b
KELT-22 A b
1SWASP J233640.32-343640.4 b
2MASS J23364036-3436404 b
WDS J23366-3437 b
TYC 7518-468-1 b
planet.description: WASP-173Ab is a massive planet in a circular orbit. The host is a G3 star, being the brighter component of the double-star system WDS23366-3437, with a companion 6 arcsecs away and 0.8 mags fainter. One of the two stars shows a rotational modulation. This Hot Jupiter was discovered by WASP-South. It was independently discovered as KELT-22Ab, with hints of a RV trend that may indicate a second companion.
